meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gitta Neufeld Abie Hadjitarkhani Amanda Sonmor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6072.

td.p: Gitta Neufeld, a Judaic teacher trainer from Far Rockaway, New York
Abie Hadjitarkhani, a psychotherapist from San Francisco, California
Amanda Sonmor, a virtual assistant originally from Denver, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $21,501)

tr.td: MEN OF MUSIC
BIOPIC-NIC
NICE TO MEAT YOU
MIDDLE "C"
(Alex: Each correct response will have a "C" in its exact center.)
WAR
GAMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew holds a wriggling echidna at the Taronga Zoo in Sydney, Australia.) Naturally, Sydney\'s Taronga Zoo has a distinctly Australian echidna; an echidna named Millie, short for "millennium", was a mascot in the summer Olympic games in this year')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew holds a wriggling echidna at the Taronga Zoo in Sydney, Australia.) Naturally, Sydney's Taronga Zoo has a distinctly Australian echidna; an echidna named Millie, short for "millennium", was a mascot in the summer Olympic games in this year

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
